message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer. I understand your perspective on the value, however, I believe the product is worth significantly more in the current market.  How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $900,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $750,000, but that's the highest I can go. I'm really interested in this product, so I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
